SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.prescript.pageUtil

Class RxDeleteRx2Action

java.lang.Object
com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
ca.openosp.openo.prescript.pageUtil.RxDeleteRx2Action
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.interceptor.ValidationAware, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, Serializable
public final class RxDeleteRx2Action extends com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
Struts 2 action for managing prescription deletion and discontinuation operations.

This action handles multiple prescription management operations including:

  • Deleting single or multiple prescriptions
  • Discontinuing prescriptions with reason tracking
  • Clearing prescription stash and re-prescription lists
  • Deleting prescriptions when closing the prescription dialog box

All deletion operations archive the drug record rather than performing hard deletes, maintaining audit trail compliance for healthcare data.

Since:
2006-04-20
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • RxDeleteRx2Action

      public RxDeleteRx2Action()

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public String execute() throws IOException, javax.servlet.ServletException
      Main execution method that routes to appropriate sub-methods based on parameterValue parameter.

      Routes to:

      • Delete2() - Single prescription deletion by ID
      • DeleteRxOnCloseRxBox() - Delete prescription when closing dialog
      • clearStash() - Clear prescription stash
      • clearReRxDrugList() - Clear re-prescription list
      • Discontinue() - Discontinue prescription with reason

      If no method parameter is provided, performs bulk deletion using the drugList parameter. Expected request parameters:

      • parameterValue - String method name to execute (optional)
      • drugList - Comma-separated drug IDs for bulk deletion (used when no method specified)
      Specified by:
      execute in interface com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action
      Overrides:
      execute in class com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      Returns:
      String action result ("success", "close", etc.) or null for AJAX responses
      Throws:
      IOException - if response writing fails
      javax.servlet.ServletException - if servlet processing fails

    • Delete2

      public String Delete2() throws IOException
      Deletes a single prescription by ID.

      Archives the specified prescription and logs the deletion action. This method is typically called via AJAX from the prescription interface. Expected request parameters:

      • deleteRxId - String in format "prefix_drugId" where drugId is the prescription ID
      Returns:
      null (AJAX response, no page navigation)
      Throws:
      IOException - if response redirect fails

    • DeleteRxOnCloseRxBox

      public String DeleteRxOnCloseRxBox() throws IOException
      Deletes a prescription when the prescription dialog box is closed.

      Uses a random ID to look up the actual drug ID from the session's random ID mapping, then archives the prescription and returns the drug ID as JSON. Expected request parameters:

      • randomId - String random identifier mapped to the actual drug ID in the session
      Returns:
      null (writes JSON response with drug ID directly to output stream)
      Throws:
      IOException - if response writing fails

    • clearStash

      public String clearStash() throws IOException
      Clears the prescription stash stored in the session.

      The stash is a temporary storage area for prescriptions that are being worked on but not yet finalized.

      Returns:
      String "successClearStash" action result
      Throws:
      IOException - if response redirect fails

    • clearReRxDrugList

      public String clearReRxDrugList() throws IOException
      Clears the re-prescription drug list stored in the session.

      The re-prescription list tracks drugs that are being re-prescribed (renewed) for the patient. This method clears that list.

      Returns:
      null (AJAX response, no page navigation)
      Throws:
      IOException - if response redirect fails

    • Discontinue

      public String Discontinue() throws IOException
      Discontinues a drug by setting archived status and creating a case management note.

      The method performs the following operations:

      • Sets the drug's archived flag to true
      • Sets the archived date to current date
      • Records the discontinuation reason
      • Creates a case management note documenting the discontinuation
      • Logs the action for audit purposes
      • Returns JSON response with drug ID and reason
      Expected request parameters:
      • drugId - Integer ID of the drug to discontinue
      • reason - String reason for discontinuation
      • comment - String additional comments (optional)
      • demoNo - String demographic number
      • drugSpecial - String drug special instructions
      Returns:
      null (writes JSON response directly to output stream)
      Throws:
      IOException - if response writing fails

    • getDrugList

      public String getDrugList()
      Gets the comma-separated list of drug IDs for bulk deletion.
      Returns:
      String comma-separated drug IDs, or null if not set

    • setDrugList

      public void setDrugList(String RHS)
      Sets the comma-separated list of drug IDs for bulk deletion.

      This setter is called automatically by Struts 2 when the drugList parameter is present in the request.

      Parameters:
      RHS - String comma-separated drug IDs
